name: The Hermit Chronicles
description:
The Hermit Chronicles is a 1st person survival-horror horror game set in a deep forest. Assuming the role of a hermit, you will have to get food, scout your surroundings, and search for resources to make gadgets. But after the sun goes down, you will have to survive for real...

Exploring the World
There are many interesting and beautiful natural places hidden in these forests. lakes, small glades and thickets where you can enjoy the tranquility and beauty of nature. More detailed exploration will open up access to new resources necessary for survival.


Gathering.
Gather edible gifts of the forest, resources, and make supplies.


Cooking.
To beat hunger, you can make more hearty dishes from the supplies you get.


Craft.
On the workbench, you can craft gear that will make your life easier.


Hunting.
Food can be obtained not only by gathering, but also - by hunting! Use a homemade bow or traps.


Changing weather.
Sometimes the weather can take you by surprise and make you go back to the cabin.


Night visitors.
There are more than just rabbits in these places. It's not at all safe in this place at night. Use your weapon of choice to confront serious danger.

  • Search for resources and build tools to help you survive.
  • Hunting, fishing, and gathering will help you avoid starvation.
  • Explore the atmospheric forest.
  • Fight for your life in fierce battles against bloodthirsty relics.
